info.description: The Giphy API allows you to search, upload, and manage GIFs and stickers. It provides endpoints to access trending content, search for specific GIFs, translate phrases into GIFs, and more.
info.title: Giphy API

paths.description: Returns a list of the most relevant and engaging GIFs each and every day.
Returns a list of the most relevant and engaging stickers each and every day.
GIPHY Search gives you instant access to our library of millions of GIFs by entering a word or phrase.
GIPHY Search gives you instant access to our library of millions of stickers by entering a word or phrase.
Converts words and phrases to the perfect GIF using GIPHY's special sauce algorithm.
Converts words and phrases to the perfect sticker using GIPHY's special sauce algorithm.
Returns a single random GIF related to the word or phrase entered.
Returns a single random sticker related to the word or phrase entered.
Generates a unique ID you can assign to each new user in your app.
Fetch GIF Objects for the set of GIPHY Emoji.
Fetch the variations associated with a given emoji.
Returns a GIF's metadata based on the GIF ID specified.
Returns metadata of multiple GIFs based on the GIF IDs specified.
Provides users a list of GIF categories on the GIPHY network.
Provides users a list of valid terms that complete the given tag on the GIPHY network.
Returns all the GIPHY channels matching the query term.
Provides users a list of tag terms related to the given tag on the GIPHY network.
Provides users a list of the most popular trending search terms on the GIPHY network.
